name: Traffic Clash - Amaze Car Race
description:
real traffic tour racing game that will lead you to another level of smooth racing city rush arcade. City traffic driving game is the latest cars racing game where you can experience the real feel of chasing and drifting through the streets of a real city rush. Show your driving skills in the city traffic jam situation by safely overtaking and smoothly crossing all the traffic in the car rush game. All you have to do is to avoid crashing and stay intact for as long as you can. Dodge the busy street cars in this traffic road car racing game.

Complete the levels by avoiding the city car crash and traffic road in the real city car driving simulator game, earn coins and unlock other cars by clearing the challenging levels. Explore different locations in day and night mode to get the thrill of this traffic road city car drive game. Drive your vehicle very fast on the tricky city roads. Have a great city tour indeed! Get coins, complete levels and upgrade the cars to increase speed, power and durability of your car game vehicles.

Drive your traffic vehicle carefully so that you may be able to complete your challenge and task in order to be car driving hero. Download the traffic road car game and enjoy the real world city rush traffic.

Features:

Amazing high resolution graphics with best sound effects.
Explore the real open world city traffic environment.
Simple, easy and effective controls.
Smooth and realistic car driving features.
Variety of traffic vehicles like buses, cars etc.
Unlock cars by completing levels and upgrade cars by earning more coins
